name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, the college ratings on Hupu have become very popular. Netizens have given their own schools harsh reviews, full of all kinds of humor, sarcasm and complaints. On the page of Nanjing University of Communication, you can see people's gratitude to the students of Nanjing University of Communication for the White Paper Movement one year later.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: No. 8 of the Golden State Warriors has now become a sensitive word for salted fish.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 18, at the D1 exit of Guangzhou Yuexiu Memorial Hall, a protesting owner from Chentougang, Shibi Street, Panyu District, Guangzhou, was scratched and taken into the car by the police when he was about to protest his rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 17, a girl from Chengdu publicly held up a sign at NTU saying "Looking for a husband" in order to stay in Taiwan, and netizens sent their blessings

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 17, Shenyang Zhongzhi investors sang the national anthem to collect debts

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the afternoon of November 18, a man lay on a passenger seat at the entrance of Nanjing South Railway Station and wailed.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Liangliang and Lijun were beaten: Where has the light in the eyes of young people gone? [Teacher Li is not your teacher]
https://t.co/F0PGnoI5t5

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 17, the teacher of Xingyao School of Yunnan University Affiliated High School in Guandu District, Kunming City, Yunnan Province, issued strict requirements for the "Belt and Road" themed event, including: the theme is "Belt and Road", but you cannot wear costumes from countries along the route, you cannot wear "strange clothes" with any foreign elements, you cannot sing Japanese and Korean songs, you cannot have rap, and no one can die in the drama, etc.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On November 18, students from Shanghai Shibei Middle School posted on Weibo that a large-scale infection occurred during the agricultural education activities for middle school students in Shanghai, and students collectively suffered from diarrhea, vomiting, fever and other symptoms.
It is reported that according to the regulations of the Shanghai Municipal Education Commission, Shibei Middle School, Tin Ka Ping Middle School, and Fengfan Middle School will conduct a five-day agricultural education activity at Donghai Farm from November 13.
However, the sanitary conditions of the agricultural education base are extremely worrying. On the afternoon and evening of November 15 and the early morning of November 16, Shibei Middle School suffered from vomiting, diarrhea, fever and other symptoms. More than 23.3% of the students participating in agricultural education at Shibei Middle School showed symptoms.
However, this health incident has not yet received any response or explanation from the agricultural education base, school or any other official channels, no news from them, and no compensation from them.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The full text is as follows:

Because my health has recovered a lot today, and I learned that a series of vicious incidents that occurred at Donghai Farm were constantly suppressed and posts were deleted, I wrote this article to protect the legitimate rights of myself as a party and victim, and all other parties. …

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"It's really scary"
On November 19, the League of Legends World Finals will start
Many students hang the flag of the Chinese WBG (Weibo) team outside their dormitory windows.
However, as the first anniversary of the White Paper Movement is approaching, the flag caused the school administrators who were unaware of the truth to be nervous, and they urgently notified the Security Department to clear the flag and strengthen the ideological guidance of students.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: WBG must not win the championship, otherwise a group of school leaders across the country will be scared crazy tomorrow night.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On November 18, at No. 15 Xinqiao Road, Qiongshan District, Haikou City, Hainan Province, the Hainan Provincial Veteran Cadre Rehabilitation Center (Hainan Provincial Geriatric Hospital) illegally built a sewage pool, triggering a large-scale protest by owners of surrounding communities. The owners said they would continue to protest and petition the Central Environmental Supervision Inspection Team.
